{"id":"JT-47231","entityId":"25-1989792","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"JT"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"47231"},{"name":"summary","value":"Experimental view: search query filed: completion: suggestions list doesn't show the entry details (type, full name etc) "},{"name":"description","value":"
for example, if i type 'spring' in the query field in the old interface, i get the completion list with few values, where i can see that #{spring boot} is tag, and #{Spring 2014} - version in MKT, and #{Spring 2015} has multiple meanings.

With the experimental design, i get the suggestions list without any comments


Sometimes this information is very essential, if you can't remember the specific name of some subsystem, for example.

Same - for the user name (no full name is displayed)

{"id":"JT-47151","entityId":"25-1983333","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"JT"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"47151"},{"name":"summary","value":"Can't properly add an image to a comment via keyboard (Cmd/Ctrl+V)"},{"name":"description","value":"
1. Edit comment
2. Want to insert (cmd+c) an image in the comment text.
3. The image is uploading, it's said "uploaded" but it doesn't appear in the text.
4. Refresh the page, the image is attached but not in the text as it was supposed to.

!image.png!
"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"created","value":"1525957039671"},{"name":"updated","value":"1526585984496"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"xi-eye"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Alexander Anisimov"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"Natasha.Katson"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Natasha Katson"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"2"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"markdown","value":"false"},{"name":"links","value":[{"value":"JT-47238","type":"Relates","role":"relates to"},{"value":"YTB-866","type":"Subtask","role":"subtask of"}]},{"name":"State","value":["Open"],"valueId":["Open"],"color":{"bg":"#fed74a","fg":"#444"}},{"name":"Subsystem","value":["Single Issue View"],"valueId":["Single Issue View"],"color":null},{"name":"Component","value":["Frontend"],"valueId":["Frontend"],"color":null},{"name":"Type","value":["Bug"],"valueId":["Bug"],"color":null},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"sprint","value":[{"value":"sprint 67","id":"YouTrack:sprint 67"}]},{"name":"attachments","value":[{"value":"weird_edit_issue.gif","id":"74-522978","url":"https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/_persistent/weird_edit_issue.gif?file=74-522978&c=true"},{"value":"image1526575207221.png","id":"74-525651","url":"https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/_persistent/image1526575207221.png?file=74-525651&c=true"}]}],"comment":[{"id":"27-2874258","author":"Andrey.Akinshin","authorFullName":"Andrey Akinshin","issueId":"JT-47151","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
I have the following problem all the time:
1. I'm making a screenshot and copy it to clipboard.
2. I'm starting a new comment and paste it via Ctrl+V.
3. I see something like !image1526574919141.png! in the comment body.
4. There are 3 possible situation with the attachment:
a) I have !image1526574919141.png! in the attachment, everything is OK.
b) I have something like !image.png! in the attachment, so my !image1526574919141.png! can't be resolved. =(
c) No attachment. =(
!image1526574981848.png!
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1526575166503,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2874262","author":"Andrey.Akinshin","authorFullName":"Andrey Akinshin","issueId":"JT-47151","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
I tried to attach a screenshot to the previous comment without success. =(
